SwitchPreference.android:title: Data Changes
SwitchPreference.android:summary: This option, if selected, will allow the application to ask for a confirmation when you want to delete certain data.
If certain buttons are too small or your fingers too large, the application will ask you to confirm that you have pressed the right button.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Standard colors
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If selected, the application displays the standard colors. Uncheck this option to choose your own colors.

Preference.android:title: Background Color
